channel.title: How can i add the webclient in the website?
channel.description: how can i add the webclient in the website?please help pictures and videos will really help alot!

would you do it fr me?

item.source: How can i add the webclient in the website?

item.title: How can i add the webclient in the website?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“soultaker432, post:5, topic:365305”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=461510.msg3376315#msg3376315 date=1287629049]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461323.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453291.0.html (614)
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,409187.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,454839.msg3330464.html#msg3330464
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440449.msg3236219.html#msg3236219
6 webclient tuts(if you haven’t already done a web client tut), the second one is for 614 deob, and i also need to know what kind of forum this is (e.g. free forums,smf, etc etc.) i know you can do it for smf,
first go to admin control panel,
then click on edit webpages then add webpage and put the webclients html coding so on so forth
and i think this would belong in the client help section…

sorry i dont have a brain a video would be better please.

well if you dont have a brain, then you wouldnt understand a video, and you shouldnt be coding in the first place, it takes brains and common sense…stop being lazy, follow a tutorial, do the html stuff, some of the tuts should at least have the code you should put on the webpage, be happy people even make these tutorials
[/quote]
theres no video and tbh its really hard[/quote]
really?hard? if its too hard, its too much for you… learn something first then come back to it? you cant expect to start off and have every single thing and have 1000 people at once without patience and learning, i mean, these are TUTORIALS! they are supposed to teach you, and those tutorials i found were from the first half of the first page when i searched webclient in the client hacking section, out of those 6, im pretty sure you can do it… or go do what i did and search more?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add the webclient in the website?
